50 class EkfSlam
51 {
52 private:
53  // TimeSynchronizer
54  message_filters::Subscriber<ekf_slam::LandmarksMap> aruco_sub_;
55  message_filters::Subscriber<nav_msgs::Odometry> odom_sub_;
56  typedef message_filters::TimeSynchronizer<ekf_slam::LandmarksMap, nav_msgs::Odometry> sync_policy_;
57  std::shared_ptr<sync_policy_> sync;
59  ros::Publisher corrected_landmark_pub_;
60  ros::Publisher corrected_odom_pub_;

64  ekf_slam::LandmarksMap corrected_robot_path_;
65  int corrected_robot_path_id_ = 0;

68  // Range bearing
69  Eigen::Vector2d range_bearing_landmark_h_ = Eigen::Vector2d(0, 0);
70  Eigen::Vector2d range_bearing_data_association_z_ = Eigen::Vector2d(0, 0);
71 
72  // Robot state
73  Eigen::VectorXd current_state_ = Eigen::VectorXd(3);
74  double current_state_changed_threshold_ = 0.01;
75  std::vector<Eigen::VectorXd> robot_state_array_;
76 
77  Eigen::VectorXd corrected_current_state_ = Eigen::VectorXd(3);
78  std::vector<Eigen::VectorXd> corrected_robot_state_array_;

82 
83  // deltas
84  double delta_x_;
85  double delta_y_;
86  double delta_theta_;

94  // Noise matrix
95  Eigen::Matrix3d noise_q_matrix_;
96  double c_ = 0.01;

105  int addLandmarksCovariance_aux = 0;

107  // Error matrix R
108  const Eigen::Matrix<double, 2, 2> R_ = (Eigen::Matrix<double, 2, 2>() << 0.01, 0, 0, 0.01).finished();
109 
110  //Eigen::Vector2d measurement_diff

119 public:
120  EkfSlam(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
121  {
122 
123  // GOOD TimeSynchronizer
124  aruco_sub_.subscribe(nh, "landmarks", 100);
125  odom_sub_.subscribe(nh, "odom", 100);
126  sync.reset(new sync_policy_(aruco_sub_, odom_sub_, 10));
127  sync->registerCallback(std::bind(&EkfSlam::ekfCallback, this, std::placeholders::_1, std::placeholders::_2));
128 
129  corrected_landmark_pub_ = nh.advertise<ekf_slam::LandmarksMap>("corrected_landmarks", 100, true);
130  corrected_odom_pub_ = nh.advertise<ekf_slam::LandmarksMap>("corrected_robot_path", 100, true);
131 
132  // initialize current position to 0
133  current_state_ << 0, 0, 0;
134  has_moved_ = false;
135 
136  // initialize timers
137  current_time_ = ros::Time::now();
138  last_time_ = ros::Time::now();
139  }
140 
141  double normalize_angle(double rad)
142  {
143  double result = std::remainder(rad, 2.0 * PI);
144  return result;
145  }
146 
148  template <typename T>
149  bool contains(std::vector<T> vec, const T &elem)
150  {
151  bool result = false;
152  if (find(vec.begin(), vec.end(), elem) != vec.end())
153  {
154  result = true;
155  }
156  return result;
157  }
158 
160  int getIndex(std::vector<int> v, int64_t K)
161  {
162  auto it = std::find(v.begin(), v.end(), K);
163  int index = it - v.begin();
164  return index;
165  }
166 
168  Eigen::VectorXd eigenMeans(std::vector<Eigen::VectorXd> &data)
169  {
170  Eigen::VectorXd means(data[0].rows());
171  for (unsigned i = 0; i < means.rows(); i++)
172  {
173  means(i) = 0;
174  }
175  // check if not empty
176  if (!data.empty())
177  {
178  // sum of peers
179  for (unsigned i = 0; i < data.size(); i++)
180  {
181  for (unsigned j = 0; j < data[0].rows(); j++)
182  {
183  means(j) += data[i](j);
184  }
185  }
186  // mean
187  for (unsigned i = 0; i < data[0].rows(); i++)
188  {
189  means(i) /= data.size();
190  }
191  }
192 
193  return means;
194  }
195 
197  double computeEigenCovariance(int &x, int &y, std::vector<Eigen::VectorXd> &data)
198  {
199  Eigen::VectorXd componentMeans = eigenMeans(data);
200 
201  double covxy;
202  double sum;
203 
204  for (unsigned i = 0; i < data.size(); i++)
205  {
206  sum += (data[i](x) - componentMeans(x)) * (data[i](y) - componentMeans(y));
207  }
208  covxy = sum / (data.size() - 1);
209  return covxy;
210  }
211 
212  Eigen::MatrixXd computeEigenCovarianceMatrix(std::vector<Eigen::VectorXd> &m)
213  {
214  Eigen::MatrixXd covMatrix(m[0].rows(), m[0].rows());
215 
216  for (unsigned i = 0; i < m[0].rows(); i++)
217  {
218  for (unsigned j = 0; j < m[0].rows(); j++)
219  {
220  covMatrix(i, j) = 0;
221  }
222  }
223  std::vector<Eigen::VectorXd> maux = m;
224 
225  for (int i = 0; i < m[0].rows(); i++)
226  {
227  for (int j = 0; j < m[0].rows(); j++)
228  {
229  // std::cout << m[0].size() << std::endl;
230  covMatrix(i, j) = computeEigenCovariance(i, j, m);
231  // std::cout << "Covariance at " << i << " " << j << " " << ": " << compute_covariance(i, j, maux) << std::endl;
232  }
233  }
234 
235  return covMatrix;
236  }
237 
239  void updateCurrentState(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr &msg)
240  {
241  current_time_ = ros::Time::now();
242  geometry_msgs::Pose2D pose2d;
243  pose2d.x = msg->pose.pose.position.x;
244  pose2d.y = msg->pose.pose.position.y;
245 
246  tf::Quaternion q(
247  msg->pose.pose.orientation.x,
248  msg->pose.pose.orientation.y,
249  msg->pose.pose.orientation.z,
250  msg->pose.pose.orientation.w);
251 
252  tf::Matrix3x3 m(q);
253  double yaw, pitch, roll;
254  m.getEulerYPR(yaw, pitch, roll);
255  // Get the matrix represented as euler angles around YXZ, roundtrip with setEulerYPR.
256  // yaw Yaw around Z axis
257  // pitch Pitch around Y axis
258  // roll around X axis
259 
260  pose2d.theta = pitch;
261 
262  // check if the robot has move
263  if (((pose2d.x > current_state_(0) + current_state_changed_threshold_) || (pose2d.x < current_state_(0) - current_state_changed_threshold_)) ||
264  ((pose2d.y > current_state_(1) + current_state_changed_threshold_) || (pose2d.y < current_state_(1) - current_state_changed_threshold_)) ||
265  ((pose2d.theta > current_state_(2) + current_state_changed_threshold_) || (pose2d.theta < current_state_(2) - current_state_changed_threshold_)))
266  {
267  has_moved_ = true;
268  std::cout << "---------------------------------------------------"
269  << std::endl
270  << "Phase 1 - Prediction" << std::endl
271  << std::endl;
272 
273  std::cout << "Step 1 - Update current state using the odometry data:" << std::endl
274  << std::endl;
275 
276  std::cout << "Old state" << std::endl
277  << std::endl;
278 
279  std::cout << "X: " << current_state_(0) << std::endl;
280  std::cout << "Y: " << current_state_(1) << std::endl;
281  std::cout << "Theta: " << current_state_(2) << std::endl
282  << std::endl;
283 
284  // Update deltas
285  delta_x_ = current_state_(0) - pose2d.x;
286  delta_y_ = current_state_(0) - pose2d.y;
287  delta_theta_ = current_state_(0) - pose2d.theta;
288 
289  // Update current position with odometry data
290  current_state_(0) = pose2d.x;
291  current_state_(1) = pose2d.y;
292  current_state_(2) = pose2d.theta;
293 
294  std::cout << "New state" << std::endl
295  << std::endl;
296 
297  std::cout << "X: " << current_state_(0) << std::endl;
298  std::cout << "Y: " << current_state_(1) << std::endl;
299  std::cout << "Theta: " << current_state_(2) << std::endl
300  << std::endl;
301 
302  robot_state_array_.push_back(current_state_);
303 
304  delta_t_ = current_time_.toSec() - last_time_.toSec();
305 
306  std::cout << "Deltas" << std::endl
307  << std::endl;
308 
309  std::cout << "Delta X: " << delta_x_ << std::endl;
310  std::cout << "Delta Y: " << delta_y_ << std::endl;
311  std::cout << "Delta theta: " << delta_theta_ << std::endl;
312  std::cout << "Delta t: " << delta_t_ << std::endl
313  << std::endl;
314 
315  last_time_ = current_time_;
316  // has_moved_ = false;
317  }
318  }
319 
321  void updateJacobianPredictionModel()
322  {
323 
324  std::cout << "Step 2 - Update matrix A - The jacobian of the prediction model" << std::endl
325  << std::endl;
326 
327  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
328  {
329  for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
330  {
331  if (i == j)
332  {
333  jacobian_a_matrix_(i, j) = 1;
334  }
335  else if (i == 0 && j == 2)
336  {
337  jacobian_a_matrix_(i, j) = -delta_y_;
338  }
339  else if (i == 1 && j == 2)
340  {
341  jacobian_a_matrix_(i, j) = delta_x_;
342  }
343  else
344  {
345  jacobian_a_matrix_(i, j) = 0;
346  }
347  }
348  }
349  std::cout << "Matrix A: The jacobian of the prediction model" << std::endl
350  << std::endl;
351 
352  std::cout << jacobian_a_matrix_ << std::endl;
353  }
354 
356  void updateNoiseQ()
357  {
358 
359  std::cout << std::endl
360  << "Step 3 - Update matrix Q - Noise" << std::endl;
361  std::cout << std::endl
362  << "Delta t: " << delta_t_ << " seconds" << std::endl;
363  std::cout << std::endl
364  << "Matrix Q: Noise - For c = " << c_ << std::endl
365  << std::endl;
366 
367  noise_q_matrix_(0, 0) = c_ * delta_x_ * delta_x_;
368  noise_q_matrix_(1, 1) = c_ * delta_y_ * delta_y_;
369  noise_q_matrix_(2, 2) = c_ * delta_theta_ * delta_theta_;
370  noise_q_matrix_(0, 1) = c_ * delta_x_ * delta_y_;
371  noise_q_matrix_(0, 2) = c_ * delta_x_ * delta_t_;
372  noise_q_matrix_(1, 0) = c_ * delta_y_ * delta_x_;
373  noise_q_matrix_(1, 2) = c_ * delta_y_ * delta_t_;
374  noise_q_matrix_(2, 0) = c_ * delta_t_ * delta_x_;
375  noise_q_matrix_(2, 1) = c_ * delta_t_ * delta_y_;
376 
377  std::cout << noise_q_matrix_ << std::endl;
378  }
379 
381  void updateCovarianceMatrixP()
382  {
383 
384  std::cout << std::endl
385  << "Step 4 - Calculate new covariance for robot position - Prr Matrix - Prr = A*Prr*A + Q" << std::endl
386  << std::endl;
387 
388  // First calculate the covariance matrix to be able to extract Prr
389  std::cout << "Step 4.1 - Extract Prr Matrix from the covariance Matrix" << std::endl
390  << std::endl;
391 
392  covariance_p_matrix_ = computeEigenCovarianceMatrix(robot_state_array_);
393 
394  std::cout << "Current covariance Matrix: " << std::endl
395  << std::endl
396  << covariance_p_matrix_ << std::endl
397  << std::endl;
398 
399  covariance_prr_matrix_ = covariance_p_matrix_.block<3, 3>(0, 0);
400 
401  std::cout << "Covariance Prr Matrix: " << std::endl
402  << std::endl
403  << covariance_prr_matrix_ << std::endl;
404 
405  std::cout << std::endl
406  << "Step 4.2 - Calculate new Prr Matrix - Prr = A*Prr*A + Q" << std::endl
407  << std::endl;
408 
409  covariance_prr_matrix_ = jacobian_a_matrix_ * covariance_prr_matrix_ * jacobian_a_matrix_ + noise_q_matrix_;
410 
411  std::cout << "New covariance Prr Matrix: " << std::endl
412  << std::endl
413  << covariance_prr_matrix_ << std::endl;
414 
415  std::cout << std::endl
416  << "Step 5 - Calculate new covariance matrix - Pri = A Pri " << std::endl
417  << std::endl;
418 
419  std::cout << "Current Covariance matrix: " << std::endl
420  << std::endl
421  << covariance_p_matrix_ << std::endl;
422 
423  covariance_p_matrix_.block<3, 3>(0, 0) = covariance_prr_matrix_;
424 
425  std::cout << std::endl
426  << "New covariance matrix with Prr block inserted: " << std::endl
427  << std::endl
428  << covariance_p_matrix_ << std::endl;
430  // covariance_p_matrix_ = jacobian_a_matrix_ * covariance_p_matrix_;
431 
432  // std::cout << std::endl
433  // << "New covariance matrix Pri = A Pri " << std::endl
434  // << std::endl
435  // << covariance_p_matrix_ << std::endl;
436 
437  std::cout << std::endl
438  << "Finished Phase 1 - Prediction"
439  << "---------------------------------------------------" << std::endl
440  << std::endl;
441  }
442 
444  void addLandmarksCovariance(const ekf_slam::LandmarksMap::ConstPtr &landmarks_map)
445  {
446  // Phase 3 - Check for new landmarks
447  for (int i = 0; i < landmarks_map->id.size(); i++)
448  {
449  // if the landmark detected is not registered in the landmarks_detected vector, register it.
450  addLandmarksCovariance_aux = landmarks_map->id[i];
451  if (!contains(landmarks_detected_, addLandmarksCovariance_aux))
452  {
453  // update the landmarks_detected vector
454  landmarks_detected_.emplace_back(addLandmarksCovariance_aux);
455  // add 2 rows at the
456  std::cout << "Old vector size: " << current_state_.size() << std::endl;
457  current_state_.resize(current_state_.size() + 2);
458 
459  // Update all the robot_state_array_ vector sizes
460  for (int k = 0; k < robot_state_array_.size(); k++)
461  {
462  robot_state_array_[k].resize(current_state_.size());
464  robot_state_array_[k](current_state_.size() - 2) = 0;
465  robot_state_array_[k](current_state_.size() - 1) = 0;
466  }
467  std::cout << "robot_state_array_ 0 vector size: " << robot_state_array_[0].size() << std::endl;
468  current_state_(current_state_.size() - 2) = landmarks_map->x[i];
469  current_state_(current_state_.size() - 1) = landmarks_map->y[i];
470  robot_state_array_.emplace_back(current_state_);
471  std::cout << "Old vector size matrix: " << covariance_p_matrix_.size() << std::endl;
472  covariance_p_matrix_.resize((covariance_p_matrix_.rows() + 2), (covariance_p_matrix_.cols() + 2));
473  std::cout << "New vector size matrix: " << covariance_p_matrix_.rows() << "x" << covariance_p_matrix_.cols() << std::endl;
474  // Initialize the new covariant matrix
475  for (int s = 0; s < covariance_p_matrix_.size(); s++)
476  {
477  covariance_p_matrix_(s) = 0;
478  }
479  updateCovarianceMatrixP();
480  }
481  }
482  }
483 
485  void updateStateFromReObservation(const ekf_slam::LandmarksMap::ConstPtr &landmarks_map)
486  {
487  // Calculate the jacobian of the measurement model - H
488  // For each matched landmark
489 
490  for (int i = 0; i < landmarks_map->id.size(); i++)
491  {
492  // long int re_observe_aux = landmarks_map->id[i];
493  int matched_landmark_x_ind = (getIndex(landmarks_detected_, landmarks_map->id[i]) * 2) + 3;
494  int matched_landmark_y_ind = matched_landmark_x_ind + 1;
495 
496  jacobian_h_matrix_(0, 0) = (current_state_(0) - current_state_(matched_landmark_x_ind)) / current_state_(2);
497  jacobian_h_matrix_(0, 1) = (current_state_(1) - current_state_(matched_landmark_y_ind)) / current_state_(2);
498  jacobian_h_matrix_(0, 2) = 0;
499  jacobian_h_matrix_(1, 0) = (current_state_(matched_landmark_y_ind) - current_state_(1)) / pow(current_state_(2), 2);
500  jacobian_h_matrix_(1, 1) = (current_state_(matched_landmark_x_ind) - current_state_(0)) / pow(current_state_(2), 2);
501  jacobian_h_matrix_(1, 2) = -1;
502 
503  std::cout << std::endl << "jacobian_h_matrix_ : " << std::endl << std::endl;
504  std::cout << jacobian_h_matrix_ << std::endl;
505 
506  // // Calculate the Kalman gain
507  Eigen::MatrixXd K = covariance_prr_matrix_ * jacobian_h_matrix_.transpose() * (jacobian_h_matrix_ * covariance_prr_matrix_ * jacobian_h_matrix_.transpose() + R_).inverse();
508  std::cout << std::endl << "covariance_prr_matrix_ : "<< std::endl << std::endl << covariance_prr_matrix_<< std::endl << std::endl;
509 
510  // calculate expected [range bearing] h
511  double range_expected = std::sqrt(std::pow(current_state_(matched_landmark_x_ind) - current_state_(0), 2) + std::pow(current_state_(matched_landmark_y_ind) - current_state_(1), 2));
512  double bearing_expected = normalize_angle(std::atan2(current_state_(matched_landmark_y_ind) - current_state_(1), current_state_(matched_landmark_x_ind) - current_state_(0)) - current_state_(2));
513  // calculate observed [range bearing] z
514  double range_observed = std::sqrt(std::pow(landmarks_map->x[i] - current_state_(0), 2) + std::pow(landmarks_map->y[i] - current_state_(1), 2));
515  double bearing_observed = normalize_angle(std::atan2(landmarks_map->y[i] - current_state_(1), landmarks_map->x[i] - current_state_(0)) - current_state_(2));
516  // Normalize bearing diference
517  double bearing_diff = normalize_angle(bearing_expected - bearing_observed);
518 
519  measurement_diff << range_expected - range_observed, bearing_diff;
520  // Calculate the new state of the vector
521  corrected_current_state_.resize(current_state_.size());
522  corrected_current_state_ = current_state_ + K * measurement_diff;
523  // Publish corrected path
524  corrected_robot_path_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
525  corrected_robot_path_.id.emplace_back(corrected_robot_path_id_);
526  corrected_robot_path_.map.emplace_back(4);
527  corrected_robot_path_.size.emplace_back(0.3);
528  corrected_robot_path_.x.emplace_back(corrected_current_state_(0));
529  corrected_robot_path_.y.emplace_back(corrected_current_state_(1));
530  corrected_robot_path_id_++;
531  }
532  }
533 
535  void ekfCallback(const ekf_slam::LandmarksMap::ConstPtr &landmarks_map, const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr &msg)
536  {
537  // Phase 1 - Prediction
538  updateCurrentState(msg);
539  if (has_moved_)
540  {
541  updateJacobianPredictionModel();
542  updateNoiseQ();
543  updateCovarianceMatrixP();
544  // Phase 3 - add new landmarks
545  addLandmarksCovariance(landmarks_map);
546 
547  // Phase 2 - Update state from re-observed landmarks
548  updateStateFromReObservation(landmarks_map);
549 
550  has_moved_ = false;
551  }
553 
554  // has_moved_ = false;
555  }
556 };
557 
558 int main(int argc, char **argv)
559 {
560  ros::init(argc, argv, "ekf_slam_node");
561 
562  ros::NodeHandle nh;
563 
564  EkfSlam ekf_slam(nh);
565 
566  ros::spin();
567 
568  return 0;
569 }
